author: Jeffery Martin
title: Tennessee Issues Coronavirus Stay-At-Home Order Citing 'Increase in Citizen Movement'
description: "In recent days we have seen data indicating that movement may be increasing and we must get these numbers trending back down," Lee said Thursday.
content:
Tennessee Governor Bill Lee was expected to sign a stay-at-home executive order Thursday closing all non-essential businesses in an attempt to curb the spread of coronavirus.
Residents are required to stay at home "unless they are carrying out essential acti… [+2685 chars]
